name: Project Exodus (JoywiredNathan, Elyranna)
description:
Welcome to Project Exodus! Thank you for checking our game out.

This is our first attempt at making a game without any knowledge on coding.

Thank you Brackeys for all the tutorials and videos and the community for making this jam possible.

We are part of a bigger group of developers called Joywire Studios

We released our mobile game for all android devices this year! go to instagram.com/joywire_studios to check it out!
